description: We are going to drop the vulnerability_occurrence_pipelines. First we need to migrate all application activity off of it. This dashboard helps monitor the situation

panels.description: The total size of the table in bytes.
panels.title: Table Size

panels.description:
Rate of row insertions over a week. Adjust the time range as needed.

- get rate of size increase per second
- divides it by the current size to get the (% increase)/sec
- x 100 to get %
- Multiplies by 86400 (seconds in a day) and 365 (days in a year) to annualize the rate
 * 100 * (86400 * 365)
panels.title: Growth Rate (per year)

panels.description: cost_per_gb is estimated and I just threw a placeholder in there
